Summary: large craft with huge lights, 2 white in middle, red on one end,green on other end
divs: Sighting DetailsDRIVING DOWN CR 321 TOWARDS TENNESSEE COLONY, SAW LARGE LIGHTS IN SKY, NEXT TO STAR LIGHTS WERE HUGE VERY BRIGHT, HAVE NEVER SEEN PLANE OR HELICOPTER WITH LIGHTS THIS LARGE. I WORKED AT PRIVATE AIRCRAFT HANGER AND AM USED TO LARGE NUMBER OF PLANES. NO NOISE, JUST 2 HUGE WHITE LIGHTS IN MIDDLE AND RED LIGHT ON ONE END, GREEN LIGHT ON OTHER END. ALL SAME SIZE. TRIED TO PULL OVER TO LOOK, BY THE TIME I STOPPED LIGHTS WERE GONE, LESS THAN ONE MINUTE. I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT I SAW BECAUSE TO SIZE OF LIGHTS WOULD BE LARGER THAN SEARCH LIGHTS & BRIGHTER, DON'T KNOW HOW LIGHTS DISAPPEARED SO QUICKLY.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Palestine
There were no other sightings in Palestine on or around October 19th 2008
